patthana8.24:1.1_0: Nasaññojanañceva nasaññojanavippayuttañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaññojano ceva nasaññojanavippayutto
patthana8.24:1.1_1: ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nasaññojanañceva nasaññojanavippayuttañca dhammaṁ
patthana8.24:1.1_2: paṭicca nasaññojanavippayutto ceva nanosaññojano ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.24:1.1_3: Nasaññojanañceva nasaññojanavippayuttañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaññojano ceva nasaññojanavippayutto
patthana8.24:1.1_4: ca nasaññojanavippayutto ceva nano ca saññojano ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana8.24:2.1_0: Nasaññojanavippayuttañceva nano ca saññojanaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaññojanavippayutto
patthana8.24:2.1_1: ceva nano ca saññojano dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nasaññojanavippayuttañceva nano
patthana8.24:2.1_2: ca saññojanaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaññojano ceva nasaññojanavippayutto ca dhammo uppajjati
patthana8.24:2.1_3: hetupaccayā. Nasaññojanavippayuttañceva nano ca saññojanaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaññojano
patthana8.24:2.1_4: ceva nasaññojanavippayutto ca nasaññojanavippayutto ceva nano ca saññojano ca dhammā
patthana8.24:3.1_0: Nasaññojanañceva nasaññojanavippayuttañca nasaññojanavippayuttañceva nano ca saññojanañca
patthana8.24:3.1_1: dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaññojano ceva nasaññojanavippayutto ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā
